opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Connecticut Department of Public Safety v. Doe, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated

opinion:
536 U.S. 985

CONNECTICUT DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY ET AL.
v.
DOE, INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED.

No. 01-1231.

Supreme Court of the United States.

September 6, 2002.

1

C. A. 2d Cir. [Certiorari granted, 535 U. S. 1077.] Motion of Reporters Committee for Freedom of the Press for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted.
